sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Plus, Filter, Search, MoreVertical, Edit, Trash2, Eye } from 'lucide-react'; const Projects = () => { const [projects] = useState([ { id: 1, name: '移动端应用开发', department: '技术部', manager: '张三', progress: 75, status: '进行中', priority: 'high', startDate: '2024-01-01', dueDate: '2024-02-15', members: 8, budget: '500,000', description: '开发企业级移动端应用，支持iOS和Android平台' }, { id: 2, name: '企业官网重构', department: '设计部', manager: '李四', progress: 45, status: '进行中', priority: 'medium', startDate: '2024-01-15', dueDate: '2024-03-01', members: 5, budget: '200,000', description: '重新设计并开发企业官方网站，提升用户体验' }, { id: 3, name: '数据分析平台', department: '数据部', manager: '王五', progress: 90, status: '即将完成', priority: 'high', startDate: '2023-12-01', dueDate: '2024-01-30', members: 6, budget: '800,000', description: '构建企业级数据分析平台，支持实时数据处理' }, { id: 4, name: '客户管理系统', department: '技术部', manager: '赵六', progress: 30, status: '进行中', priority: 'medium', startDate: '2024-01-10', dueDate: '2024-04-15', members: 7, budget: '600,000', description: '开发客户关系管理系统，提升客户服务质量' } ]); const [filterStatus, setFilterStatus] = useState('all'); const [filterPriority, setFilterPriority] = useState('all'); const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case '进行中': return 'status-info'; case '即将完成': return 'status-success'; case '已完成': return 'status-success'; case '暂停': return 'status-warning'; default: return 'status-info'; } }; const getPriorityColor = (priority) => { switch (priority) { case 'high': return 'text-danger'; case 'medium': return 'text-warning'; case 'low': return 'text-success'; default: return 'text-text-muted'; } }; const filteredProjects = projects.filter(project => { if (filterStatus !== 'all' && project.status !== filterStatus) return false; if (filterPriority !== 'all' && project.priority !== filterPriority) return false; return true; }); return (
{/* 页面标题 */}

项目管理

管理所有项目信息与进度

{/* 筛选和搜索 */}
筛选:
{/* 项目列表 */}
{filteredProjects.map((project) => (

{project.name}

{project.priority === 'high' ? '🔴' : project.priority === 'medium' ? '🟡' : '🟢'}

{project.description}

部门: {project.department} 负责人: {project.manager} 成员: {project.members}人
{project.status}
{/* 进度条 */}
进度 {project.progress}%
{/* 项目信息 */}
开始: {project.startDate} 截止: {project.dueDate} 预算: ¥{project.budget}
))}
{/* 统计信息 */}
{projects.length}
总项目数
{projects.filter(p => p.status === '进行中').length}
进行中
{projects.filter(p => p.priority === 'high').length}
高优先级
{Math.round(projects.reduce((acc, p) => acc + p.progress, 0) / projects.length)}%
平均进度
); }; export default Projects;
